title: BORIFLORS Women's Sexy Club Bodycon Cut Out Halter Backless Ruched Mini Party Dresses
description: Fabrics: The sexy club dress is made of double layers fabric, not see through, high stretchy, comfortable, solid color

Design: The bodycon halter going out dress feature cut out detail and criss cross design, silver round ring detail, halter neck, mini length, backless, sleeveless, slim fitted, with ruched on sides and back, wrap around halter neck ties, self tie back. The cute tight dress fits like a glove hugs your curves flatteringly, fashion design with sexy look, make you stand out in the night party or club. The date night dress definitely worth having, perfect for summer spring fall

Occasion: The cutout mini dress is suitable for club, party, date night, going out, birthday, beach, neon night out, dinner, vacation, evening, seaside, home, BBQ, shopping, homecoming, halloween and other special occasion. You can pair with jacket, coat, cardigan, high heels, sandals, sneakers and etc, to create a variety of styles, makes you more fashion, beautiful and sexy
Size: S:4-6, M:8-10, L:12-14, XL:16-18, The trendy body con dress can be wear as going out dress, rave outfits, clubwear outfits, birthday dresses. The must-have sexy dress this summer
Care:Machine Wash and Hand Washing, No bleach
